channel.title: Getting people on my server
channel.description: Okay so my port is open, my environmental variables are done, ive got my no-ip. What files do I need to send to the person that I want to play with is my question? Thanks

item.title: Getting people on my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:4, topic:530346”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=649102.msg4363586#msg4363586 date=1379211016]
You send client files with the changed ip
[/quote]

Wrong, you make a jar, you can add an auto cache downloader or you can add the cache to the folder with the jar, why would you send client files?[/quote]
That isn’t wrong. You do send the client files if you don’t make the jar, as long as you don’t send the source files (.java’s).
Because, technically, when you send the jar you’re still sending ‘client files’ just packaged differently.

Read full topic
